zh-cn: 民族报、全民日报、经济时报联合版
民族报、全民日报、经济时报联合报

description.zh-cn: 台湾的综合性报纸，为联合报系的核心事业之一，与《自由时报》、《中国时报》合称台湾三大报。
description.en: A comprehensive newspaper in Taiwan, one of the core businesses of the United Daily News Group. It is considered one of the three major newspapers in Taiwan, along with the Liberty Times and the China Times.

description.zh-cn: 《联合报》的创办人之一。
description.en: One of the founders of the United Daily News.

description.zh-cn: 《联合报》的创办人之一。
description.en: One of the founders of the United Daily News.

description.zh-cn: 《联合报》的创办人之一。
description.en: One of the founders of the United Daily News.

description.zh-cn: 以《联合报》为核心发展成的台湾报业集团。
description.en: A Taiwanese newspaper group developed around the core of the United Daily News.

description.zh-cn: 《联合报》的前身之一，由王惕吾担任负责人。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the United Daily News, led by Wang Ti-wu.

description.zh-cn: 《联合报》的前身之一，由范鹤言担任负责人。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the United Daily News, led by Fan He-yan.

description.zh-cn: 《联合报》的前身之一，由林顶立担任负责人。
description.en: One of the predecessors of the United Daily News, led by Lin Ding-li.

description.zh-cn: 台湾企业家，曾短暂持有《联合报》股权。
description.en: A Taiwanese entrepreneur who briefly held a stake in the United Daily News.

description.zh-cn: 联合报系的综合性中文晚报，已于2020年6月2日停刊。
description.en: A comprehensive Chinese-language evening newspaper of the United Daily News Group, which ceased publication on June 2, 2020.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的政党。
description.en: A political party in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统及中国国民党主席。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the President of the Republic of China and Chairman of the Kuomintang.

description.zh-cn: 1992年由多个台湾社会团体因不满《联合报》对中国官员言论的报导而发起的抵制运动。
description.en: A boycott movement initiated in 1992 by several Taiwanese social groups in response to dissatisfaction with the United Daily News's reporting on a Chinese official's remarks.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的社会运动团体。
description.en: A social movement group in Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党前主要领导人之一。
description.en: A former senior leader of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 台湾法律学者，1992年“退报救台湾”运动发起人之一。
description.en: A Taiwanese legal scholar and one of the initiators of the 1992 "Boycott Newspaper to Save Taiwan" movement.

description.zh-cn: 1954年中华民国内政部颁布的一项旨在限制新闻自由的法令，后被行政院驳回。
description.en: A decree issued by the Ministry of the Interior of the Republic of China in 1954 to restrict press freedom, which was later rejected by the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国关于出版品的法律。
description.en: The law concerning publications in the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治科学家，亚洲事务专家。
description.en: An American political scientist and expert on Asian affairs.

description.zh-cn: 台湾历史学家，专长为台湾史。
description.en: A Taiwanese historian specializing in the history of Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A Taiwanese politician who served as the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物、商人，曾任美国总统。
description.en: An American politician and businessman who served as the President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统的幕僚机关。
description.en: The staff agency of the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府负责外交事务的行政部门。
description.en: The executive department of the U.S. federal government responsible for foreign affairs.

en: Ministry of National Defense (Republic of China)

description.zh-cn: 中华民国掌理国防事务的最高机关。
description.en: The highest authority in the Republic of China responsible for national defense affairs.

description.zh-cn: 王惕吾与范鹤言、林顶立共同创办了《联合报》的前身《民族报、全民日报、经济时报联合版》。
description.en: Wang Ti-wu, along with Fan He-yan and Lin Ding-li, co-founded the 'Minzu Bao, Quanmin Daily, Economic Times Joint Edition', the predecessor of the United Daily News.

description.zh-cn: 范鹤言与王惕吾、林顶立共同创办了《联合报》的前身《民族报、全民日报、经济时报联合版》。
description.en: Fan He-yan, along with Wang Ti-wu and Lin Ding-li, co-founded the 'Minzu Bao, Quanmin Daily, Economic Times Joint Edition', the predecessor of the United Daily News.

description.zh-cn: 林顶立与王惕吾、范鹤言共同创办了《联合报》的前身《民族报、全民日报、经济时报联合版》。
description.en: Lin Ding-li, along with Wang Ti-wu and Fan He-yan, co-founded the 'Minzu Bao, Quanmin Daily, Economic Times Joint Edition', the predecessor of the United Daily News.

description.zh-cn: 《民族报》、《经济时报》、《全民日报》三报联合创刊，成为《联合报》的前身。
description.en: The Minzu Bao, the Economic Times, and the Quanmin Daily jointly launched a publication that became the predecessor of the United Daily News.

description.zh-cn: 《民族报》、《经济时报》、《全民日报》三报联合创刊，成为《联合报》的前身。
description.en: The Minzu Bao, the Economic Times, and the Quanmin Daily jointly launched a publication that became the predecessor of the United Daily News.

description.zh-cn: 《民族报》、《经济时报》、《全民日报》三报联合创刊，成为《联合报》的前身。
description.en: The Minzu Bao, the Economic Times, and the Quanmin Daily jointly launched a publication that became the predecessor of the United Daily News.

description.zh-cn: 《联合报》是联合报系的核心事业。
description.en: The United Daily News is the core business of the United Daily News Group.

description.zh-cn: 《联合晚报》是联合报系的晚报，后因市场上晚报需求减少而停刊。
description.en: The United Evening News was an evening newspaper of the United Daily News Group, which later ceased publication due to declining market demand for evening papers.

description.zh-cn: 范鹤言与林顶立于1972年将股权转让给王永庆，王永庆于次年出脱股权。
description.en: Fan He-yan and Lin Ding-li transferred their shares to Wang Yung-ching in 1972, who then sold his stake the following year.

description.zh-cn: 《联合报》的社论立场被部分人士认为偏袒中国国民党执政时的政策，常被视为亲蓝媒体。
description.en: The editorial stance of the United Daily News is considered by some to be biased towards the policies of the Kuomintang when it was in power, and it is often regarded as a pro-Pan-Blue media outlet.

description.zh-cn: 《联合报》社论曾被认为参与中国国民党党内的省籍斗争，立场倾向非主流派，并曾以「民粹主义」指涉时任主流派领导者的李登辉。
description.en: Editorials in the United Daily News were once considered to be involved in the provincial-origin struggles within the Kuomintang, leaning towards the non-mainstream faction, and had used the term 'populism' to refer to Lee Teng-hui, the leader of the mainstream faction at the time.

description.zh-cn: 《联合报》于1992年10月30日报导中共中央政治局常委李瑞环声称“大陆不惜中止经建阻止台湾独立”，该报导被指不实并直接引发了“退报救台湾”运动。
description.en: On October 30, 1992, the United Daily News reported that Li Ruihuan, a member of the Standing Committee of the Politburo of the CPC, claimed that 'the mainland would not hesitate to halt economic construction to prevent Taiwan's independence.' This report was accused of being false and directly triggered the 'Boycott Newspaper to Save Taiwan' movement.

description.zh-cn: 该运动旨在抵制《联合报》，呼吁民众不看、拒买、退订，并游说广告业者拒登广告。
description.en: The movement aimed to boycott the United Daily News, calling on the public not to read, buy, or subscribe to it, and lobbying advertisers to refuse to place ads.

description.zh-cn: 澄社是发起“退报救台湾”运动的团体之一。
description.en: Taiwan Citizen's Watch was one of the groups that initiated the 'Boycott Newspaper to Save Taiwan' movement.

description.zh-cn: 在联合报控告退报运动发起人后，林山田亦自诉联合报诽谤，因退报运动被说成恐怖活动。
description.en: After the United Daily News sued the initiators of the newspaper boycott movement, Lin Shan-tien also filed a lawsuit against the United Daily News for defamation, because the boycott was described as a terrorist activity.

description.zh-cn: 《联合报》发表三篇社论反对限制新闻自由的《新闻禁例》，后行政院驳回此案。
description.en: The United Daily News published three editorials opposing the 'Press Prohibition Decree' which aimed to restrict press freedom. The Executive Yuan later rejected the case.

description.zh-cn: 《联合报》陆续发表九篇社论，反对政府修正《出版法》以赋予行政机关对报纸的处分权。
description.en: The United Daily News successively published nine editorials opposing the government's amendment to the 'Publication Act' to grant administrative agencies punitive power over newspapers.

description.zh-cn: 因联合报扭曲其言论作为标题，葛来仪在社交媒体上表达强烈不满，并表示不排除提告。
description.en: Due to the United Daily News distorting her remarks in a headline, Bonnie Glaser expressed strong dissatisfaction on social media and stated she would not rule out legal action.

description.zh-cn: 许雪姬表示联合报的专访内容和标题并非出自她口，认为自己被设计。
description.en: Hsu Hsueh-chi stated that the content and headline of an exclusive interview by the United Daily News did not come from her and that she believed she was set up.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国总统蔡英文与时任美国候任总统川普进行越洋电话谈话。
description.en: Then-President of the Republic of China Tsai Ing-wen held a telephone conversation with then-U.S. President-elect Donald Trump.

description.zh-cn: 美国国务院驳斥《联合报》关于美国要求台湾发展生物战剂的报导，称其无事实根据。
description.en: The U.S. Department of State refuted a report by the United Daily News that the U.S. had asked Taiwan to develop biological weapons, calling the report baseless.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统府驳斥《联合报》关于南海工作会议的报导，指其未经查证、迳自捏造。
description.en: The Office of the President of the Republic of China refuted a report by the United Daily News regarding the South China Sea Working Meeting, accusing it of fabrication without verification.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国防部驳斥《联合报》关于军方发展生物战剂的报导，强调绝不发展生物战剂。
description.en: The Ministry of National Defense of the Republic of China refuted a report by the United Daily News about the military developing biological weapons, emphasizing that it would never develop such weapons.
